original_text: And this shall be a sign unto thee, that shall come upon thy two sons, on Hophni and Phinehas; in one day they shall die both of them.
korean_text: 네 두 아들 홉니와 비느하스가 한 날에 죽으리니 그 둘이 당할 그 일이 네게 표징이 되리라

sentences.original_text: And this shall be a sign unto thee
that shall come upon thy two sons
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아들 두 사람에게 임할 것

sentences.original_text: in one day they shall die both of them
